articles.title: Cameron On Future Non-"Avatar" Films - Dark Horizons
articles.description: “Avatar: The Way of Water” has sailed past the $1.1 billion mark at the global box office and is now set to overtake “Top Gun: Maverick” to become the highest-grossing international release of 2022. The film added a further $70.4 million to its global haul on…
articles.content: “Avatar: The Way of Water” has sailed past the $1.1 billion mark at the global box office and is now set to overtake “Top Gun: Maverick” to become the highest-grossing international release of 2022.… [+1886 chars]
